channel.title: Angular on Tyler Harms
channel.description: Recent content in Angular on Tyler Harms

item.title: Mixing AngularJS and Symfony
item.description: I enjoy being a PHP Developer. PHP is a very flexible language and Symfony2 is a modern framework that forces many SOLID habits on developers. I also enjoy working with AngularJS. AngularJS makes Javascript fun and much easier to work with. Moreover, much like Symfony2, it forces good habits on developers. Getting the two to work together, however, can be a little bit of a chore if not careful.
